text: Förälskade is a studio album by Thorleifs,Information at Svensk mediedatabasThorleif' website released 1 October 2008. On the album charts, it topped in Sweden, reached 17th position in Denmark and 34th position in Norway. A Danish language-version of the album, Forelskede, was also recorded.Thorleif's website The song "Ingen torkar längre tåren på min kind" is a cover version of Swedish country artist Ingela Söderlund.CD-omtaler 2008 ==Track listing== #"Jag tänder ett ljus" #"Det är bara himmelen" #"Utanför min dörr" #"Förälskade" #"Ingen torkar längre tåren på min kind" #"Dina blåa ögon" #"Innan höstlöven faller" #"Dagen som förändrade mitt liv" #"Blue Blue Moon" #"Om du var här hos mig" #"Lyckliga gatan" ("Il ragazzo della via Gluck") #"I Have a Dream" (instrumental) #"Ingen av oss" #"Kärlekens hus" ("Living in a House Full of Love") (bonus track) #"Lite av din tid, lite av din kärlek" (bonus track) ==Contributors== *Thorleifs - musicians *Conny Olsson - guitar *Mats Wikman - guitar *Thorleif Torstensson, Thomas Thörnholm - producers ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2008-2009) !Peak position |- |Denmark (Tracklisten)Danishcharts |align="center"|17 |- |Norway (VG-lista)Norwegiancharts |align="center"|22 |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan)Swedishcharts |align="center"|1 |} == References == Category:2008 albums Category:Thorleifs albums
title: Förälskade
